parameters: Using TDDP_MouseSystemEx plugin with the
click_activate notetag means this event
is triggered when player clicks on it.
Above exclamation shows playe what will move.
this._eventId
The DoClick common event will tell this
event to move somewhere when the user
clicks on a valid tile location.
The DoMove event should make sure this event's
self switch B is turned on to prevent
further movement.
This page is for after event has done initial move.
By default, just do nothing so no subsequent
movement.

Would you like instructions?
Yes

People1
OK, I will show you the manual. You
can find this yourself from the

People1

top of the game area. Tap me on the
shoulder if you need something.
